QuestData.Title: Beating Them Back!
QuestData.Description: So you're the new recruit from Stormwind, eh? I'm Marshal McBride, commander of this garrison. Glad to have you on board...$B$B<McBride looks through some papers.>$B$B$n. It is $n, right?$B$BYou've arrived just in time. The Blackrock orcs have managed to sneak into Northshire through a break in the mountain. My soldiers are doing the best that they can to push them back, but I fear they will be overwhelmed soon.$B$BHead northwest into the forest and kill the attacking Blackrock worgs! Help my soldiers!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Blackrock Battle Worgs are fierce predators.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you beaten back the Blackrock worgs?
QuestData.RewardText: You've bought us a little time, $n, but we've got even bigger problems to deal with now.
